entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind light except southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near Bowen Island early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
